description: From ski tours to alpine climbing, this versatile all-season midlayer knows how to deliver. Warm and breathable, its body-mapped design offers focused wind protection, thermal regulation, and moisture wicking right where you need it. Lightweight yet packing a serious punch, this abrasion-resistant jacket is made with recycled materials and comes with a host of mountain- ready features to keep you safe and comfortable on the move. With excellent freedom of movement and a fitted hood that can be worn under a helmet, the Eiger Nordwand ML Hybrid Hooded Jacket is a must-have for vertical adventures on rock and ice.
name: Mammut Eiger Nordwand ML Hybrid Hooded Jacket - Mens
